name: Stealth Firefox
description:
Based on Alex Faaborg's+Stephen Horlander's Firefox Private Browsing theme (see http://blog.mozilla.com/faaborg/2011/11/01/cutting-room-floor/), Uses Tss's Nightly White Icons: http://userstyles.org/styles/51603/nightly-white-icons

Windows Only right now. I don't have a Mac, so I can't test it

discussions.name: It'cool and thanks.But why don't change the "PersonalToolbar"?
